title: TPS Professional (Industrial Engineer)
job_desc:
Toyota Motor Philippines is looking for an TPS ﻿Professional to join our Human Resources team based in Santa Rosa City, Laguna, Philippines.

A TPS ﻿Professional﻿ is a member of the Toyota Production Section that handles the development of employees through TPS education, application and assessment.

Your role and responsibilities:

  • Responsible for Toyota Production System Training (includes training, application and assessment)

  • Perform audit and assessment of production & office processes

  • Initiate workplace improvement

  • Support company's kaizen culture promotion

Our perfect match:

  • You have a bachelors degree in Industrial Engineering

  • You can develop and use collaborative relationships to facilitate the accomplishment of work goals.

  • You continuously seek opportunities to address problems and challenges the current state of the organization.

  • You are proactive; taking prompt action to accomplish objectives and taking action to achieve goals beyond what is required.

  • You can identify opportunities and take action to build strategic relationships between one's area and other areas, teams, departments, units, or organizations to help achieve business goals.

  • You are capable of clearly conveying information and ideas through a variety of media to individuals or groups in a manner that engages the audience and helps them understand and retain the message.

title: SAP Planner
company: SAN MIGUEL INTEGRATED LOGISTICS SERVICES, INC.
job_desc:
Qualifications:

  • College graduate, preferably an IT graduate or any related course

  • Minimum of two (2) years actual work experience in Transportation planning and Order processing in SAP system

  • Must be proficient in SAP system

  • Must have good communication skills, demonstrate personal integrity, customer oriented, team player and adaptable to change

  • Must be meticulous during planning and processing

Duties & Responsibilities:

  • Performs the route planning activities based on the Sales Order.

  • Determines the Sales Orders (SO) to be consolidated in one shipment that considers the proximity of the distribution hub to the consignees, the economical load per shipment, the capacity/size of the truck use, the type of truck to use and request for service providers to be used in the sales shipment.

  • Creates delivery orders based on the Sales Orders.

  • Creates shipment number based on the route planning.

  • Prints the loading and delivery documents to the Checker and Dispatcher for the dispatching activities.

title: Industrial Engineer Manager
job_desc:
• Conduct time studies and gather data on production processes to determine the most efficient methods and identify areas for improvement.
  • Analyze data collected during time studies to identify bottlenecks, inefficiencies, and areas where productivity can be enhanced.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including production managers, engineers, and technicians, to develop and implement process improvement initiatives.
  • Design and implement work methods, procedures, and layouts to optimize workflow and minimize waste.
  • Develop and maintain accurate time standards for various tasks and operations.Create and update standard operating procedures (SOPs) and work instructions to ensure consistency and efficiency.
  • Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with established standards and procedures.
  • Provide training and guidance to employees on improved processes and time management techniques.
  • Utilize software tools and systems to track and monitor productivity metrics.
  • Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and technological advancements related to time study and process improvement.

Qualifications:

  • Graduate of Bachelor of Science in Industrial Engineer
  • Change Management
  • Critical Thinking
  • Data results gathering and analysis
  • Can drive results
  • Process Improvement methods

title: Production Engineer (Printer)
job_desc:

  • With or without experience

  • With basic knowledge IE / QC tools

  • Have background in Efficiency and Planning

  • Knowledgeable in Manpower Management is an advantage

  • Proficient in Microsoft Office Applications

  • Good in communication skills & ability to work under pressure.

  • Good analytical and problem-solving skills

title: Production Engineer (Toner)
job_desc:
• Candidate must possess at least bachelor’s degree in industrial engineering

  • With at least 1-year related work experience as Production Engineer

  • With very good Communication, Leadership, and Presentation Skills

  • Proficient in using MS applications especially MS Excel

  • Must have background in Production Progress Monitoring and Recovery Planning

  • Must have background in Implementation of Improvement Activity

title: Quality Engineer
job_desc:
Job Title: Quality Engineer

Job Description: Lead root cause analysis to reduce rework, improving production yields.

· Review and disposition non-conforming parts/systems.

· Identify opportunities to improve product manufacturability.

· Contribute to engineering change orders as necessary.

· Develop acceptance test plans and testing procedures in accordance with contract requirements and product specifications.

· Contribute to program’s engineering change proposals.

· Write test reports as necessary.

· Track and monitor production metrics yields, perform process capability.

· Conduct conformance verification, including scheduling, inspection, testing, and reporting.

· Complete conformance inspection failure investigations and identify root causes and implement corrective actions.

· Compile failure reports as necessary.

· Interface with customers during IPT meetings and program reviews as required.

· Perform internal audits and maintenance of the organization’s ISO 9001:2015 certification.

· Other tasks as assigned.

Required Experience

3-5 years in the same field and came from the companies which is in the list.

DAIHO, PTP, TRC, KOSHIN, AIHAN, EPPI-IH, HONGTAI, K&K, PHILINAK, BO CHENG, AIPI, MATEX, K&K, DAIHO, BIG, TOMS, PHILINAK, TAIHAN, TRC, MATEX, HONTAI, SHINGHUNG, ZHONG YU, KOSHIN, SANSYU, OB KOGYO, BO CHENG, LEADENCE, AIPI

Benefits: Basic Mandatories

Work Schedule: MTW (8am to 7pm) and TH - F (8am to 6pm).

Location: Calamba, Laguna

title: Industrial Engineer
job_desc:
About Us

Bestpak Packaging Solutions, Inc. started as a one-product company in 1956. Today, we are one of the leading suppliers of packaging in the Philippines, offering the widest range of plastic bottles, plastic jars, tottles, closures, caps, glass bottles, and pumps covering the cosmetics, personal care, pharmaceutical, food, and beverage,and home care product markets. With over 60 years of industry experience, we deliver the most innovative packaging for today’s markets.

 

Qualifications & Experience

  • Graduate of any Engineering course, preferably Industrial Engineering
  • With at least 1 year work experience
  • Willing to work in Quezon Avenue, Quezon City
  • On site work

 

Tasks & Responsibilities

Monitor and generate Job Orders/Work Orders for all pending Sales Orders

Develop production schedules for open work orders

Manage and oversee inventory levels for finished goods and raw materials

Coordinate and supervise subcontractor activities

Maintain quality standards and internal documentation

Analyze and optimize the use of materials, machinery, and labor

Assist clients with their quality issues and conduct the necessary corrective action

 

Benefits

  • 13th month + Bonuses
  • SL/VL + HMO Package
  • Annual Salary Increase (performance based)

title: Material Planner (Project-Based)
job_desc:
• Scheduling of purchased parts: Ensuring a trouble-free supply of materials by domestic and foreign suppliers of a range of parts (on time and on schedule).

  • In detail, this includes: determining material/parts requirements and, if applicable, the associated special parts requirements, carrying out scheduling, checking delivery schedules, checking call-off confirmations, clarifying delivery situations, reminding deliveries.

  • Monitor material receipts, process complaints and carry out corrections regarding overstocks or missing parts within the specified framework.

  • In addition, required quantities may have to be estimated together with the specialist departments. Profitability and security of supply must be taken into account according to a variety of criteria and order quantities and dates must be determined.

  • In the event of bottlenecks or other delivery difficulties (e.g. raw material bottlenecks, slumps in quality, force majeure), coordinate production assurance measures internally and externally, carry out rescheduling.

  • Draw up delivery schedules and coordinate them with suppliers and external service providers.

  • Provide critical parts in a timely manner, taking into account various criteria.

  • Participation and contribution of logistics interests in product arrivals and departures.

  • Participation and enforcement of logistics interests in complex process improvement projects.

  • Active inventory management to reduce unnecessary overstocking within logistical possibilities.

title: Manufacturing Process Engineer
job_desc:
Manufacturing- Process Engineer is mainly responsible for the design and execution of projects and processes of increasing productivity, eliminating or reducing wastes, reducing costs, and ensuring quality standards are maintained.
Works closely with Production team, R&D, QA and M&E department to ensure optimized layouts and streamlined production processes.

 

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Lead project implementation, design, installation and commissioning of new Processing and Packing equipment

  • Evaluate existing manufacturing processes and identify areas for improvement
    a) Identify new equipment, processes, layouts, procedures, and systems to further improve the manufacturing of products
    b) Perform problem-solving initiatives for any production deviations that impact measures

  • Ensure manufacturing processes, equipment, and products comply with safety standards and legal regulations

  • Lead in maintaining an organized, clean, orderly, and safe working environment by complying with company procedures, rules and regulations, and other housekeeping standards

  • With timely access to the summary of Incident Disposition Reports (IDR) and Production Records, determine problem resolutions and implement systemic improvements

  • Get actively involved in projects and routines (e.g. DOR, WOR, MOR) that aim to improve quality and efficiency, reduce waste, and correct/resolve IDRs in production operations

  • Based on Defects, Scraps, and Waste performance, determine initiatives and projects that will reduce production costs focusing on WASTEs elimination or reduction thru the application of Lean Six Sigma Tools and Methodologies
    a) Develop and implement cost-saving measures and quality control systems
    b) Review and update production flow chart and descriptions, workflow, and ensure optimization of existing and new production lines.

  • Participate in trial runs of production processes, start-up activities, R&D trials, installation, and commissioning activities

  • Perform other duties as may be required for the continuity and effectiveness of production operations

  • As appointed, perform duties and responsibilities attached to his/her role in Food Safety System Certification (FSSC)

  • Serve as a role model for production competency, GMP, CCP, oPRP/ PRP, FSSC & ISO 22000 standards, and food safety discipline

  • Report any quality and food safety deviation and incidents of standards and company rules’ violations to the immediate superior and QA/ QC; prepare an Incident Disposition Report (IDR) as necessary

  • Develop and maintain effective relations with all company employees at various levels of the organization, including those from service provider/s

  • Serve as a role model for behaviors related to Marigold Way’s core ideology, mission, core values, principles, and practices

  • Report untoward behavior of personnel, production operation problems (before, during, and after operation); participate in all investigations as directed by HR/ LR. 

 

MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS/EXPERIENCE:

  • BS in Mechanical, Electrical, Electronics and Communications Engineering preferably with a minimum of 2 years of experience in a food manufacturing environment

  • Experienced in food processing, filling, and packing machines

  • Knowledgeable in PLC/HMI Systems and Process automation

  • Willing to work on shifting schedules (weekly change of shift)

  • Can work in Jenny's, Pasig City.

title: Industrial Engineer
job_desc:
Bachelor's degree in INDUSTRIAL ENGINEERING graduate

Experience in production planning, warehousing, production or purchasing an advantage

Above average Math skills

Above average communication, interpersonal and people handling skills

Strong management and organizational skills

Flexible and organized

Computer literate

Results oriented

Mature and can handle work pressure well

title: Process Sr. Engineer
job_desc:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Performs troubleshooting/investigation of process and jigs related problems.

  • Implements corrective actions and initiates production/process improvement projects.

  • Performs necessary activities related to new model production preparation and new change of color development:

  • Participates on 1QDC Activity to ensure new model and COC preparation targets are attained.

  • Designs and procures racks, buckets, jigs, machines, special tools and other items needed.

  • Conducts Failure Mode and Effect Analyss / Evaluations.

  • Prepares process flow layout, process planning sheet & quality documents for welding.

  • Prepares material flow and evaluation to all new model for welding.

  • Conducts Time and Motion Study and Line Balancing Activities.

  • Performs activities related to Welding Line Preparation.

  • Uses of known quality tools like SPC, 7QC, 8D, FMEA and other tools to prevent/solve the issue.

  • Implements POKA YOKE solution on all jig, fixtures and equipment.

  • Conducts performance evaluation of subordinates.

  • Prepares packaging designs of localized parts including prototyping and evaluation.

  • Performs other related duties or projects that may be assigned.

JOB QUALIFICATIONS:

  • Graduate of any Engineering Course preferably Electrical, Mechanical, Industrial Engineering.

  • Preferably Male (as part of Job Requirement).

  • With at least 1-2 year experience in similar capacity.

title: Production/Material Planner
job_desc:
• Ensure customer delivery targets for Semi products are met by collaborating with the internal team PROGs, Planners, Logistics, Customer Service, etc.
  • Conduct regular meetings with the Semi repairable planners for alignment of actions and follow through for the attainment of delivery metrics. Escalates timely, if needed
  • Provide update on customer delivery performance progress, late drivers, outlook, highlights issues and recovery requirements when during the weekly Operations meeting & as the need arises
  • Provide regular update on the Semi delivery performance to the CSO Management & GCS field 
  • Prepare multiple On Time Delivery (OTD) reports like the Quarterly Scorecard, Monthly CSO & Field Team Integration Meetings of pre-identified Top Accounts to the GCS Regional Managers, CSO Business Reviews & other OTD requests involving multiple platforms
  • Work on complex data where analysis of situations or data requires an in-dept evaluation of variable factors like what drives the late delivery performance, (spares, logistics, repair output and others).  
  • Exercise judgment in selecting methods, techniques and evaluation criteria for obtaining results
  • Maintain the relevance of New Planning Methodology, initiate and recommend improvements balancing the attainment of customer delivery targets & spares efficiency.
  • Planning support for declared crisis situations involving multiple platforms including simulations of customer impact in terms of OTD performance & recovery

Basic Qualifications/Skills Required

  • Bachelor of Science in Industrial Eng'g, Statistics or related field with at least 3 years planning or data analytics experience. Other degree holders of relevant experience are welcome to apply
  • Possess ability to manage cross-functional teams
  • Possess strong leadership, commitment & is flexible in dealing with the different people in the organization
  • With strong sense of urgency & work within deadlines
  • Has advanced Excel skills & preferably with knowledge on MS Power Platform 
  • Has good communication skills & can relate well with people

title: Manufacturing Engineer
job_desc:
Responsible for designing, implementing and reviewing the procedures and equipment involved in the manufacturing process. Their duties include tooling development, researching automation techniques, testing new systems for efficiency and planning factory layouts to optimize production.

Evaluate manufacturing processes and make recommendations for LEAN improvements and technical innovation.

Conduct analysis of fabrication and welding processes, including test methods and relevant data.

Create reports containing data and statistics of fabrication and welding processes to enable management to better understand future requirements needed for the said process.

title: Industrial Engineer
job_desc:
About the role

Mobelhaus Phils., Inc. is seeking a talented Industrial Engineer to join our team. In this full-time position based in Mandaue City, Cebu, you will play a key role in optimising our manufacturing processes and improving operational efficiency. As an Industrial Engineer, you will use your expertise to streamline workflows, enhance productivity, and drive continuous improvement across our organisation.

What you'll be doing

  • Analyse production processes and identify opportunities for optimisation
  • Design and implement process improvements to increase efficiency and reduce waste
  • Develop and maintain quality control systems to ensure consistent product quality
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and address operational challenges
  • Provide technical support and training to production staff
  • Collect and analyse data to inform decision-making and support strategic initiatives
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in industrial engineering

What we're looking for

  • Bachelor's degree in Industrial Engineering or a related field
  • Minimum 1 year of experience in an industrial engineering or manufacturing role
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Proficiency in process improvement methodologies, such as Lean and Six Sigma
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
  • Familiarity with production planning, inventory management, and quality control systems

What we offer

At Mobelhaus Phils., Inc., we are committed to providing our employees with a supportive and rewarding work environment. In addition to a competitive salary, we offer a comprehensive benefits package that includes health insurance, retirement planning, and opportunities for professional development. Our company culture values innovation, collaboration, and work-life balance, making us an excellent choice for those seeking a fulfilling career in industrial engineering.

About us

Mobelhaus Phils., Inc. is a leading manufacturer of high-quality furniture and home decor products. With over 20 years of industry experience, we pride ourselves on our commitment to excellence, sustainability, and customer satisfaction. As a growing company, we are continuously seeking talented individuals to join our team and contribute to our ongoing success.

If you are an experienced Industrial Engineer who is passionate about driving operational excellence, we encourage you to apply now for this exciting opportunity.

title: Sales Engineer - Specialty Lubricants and Greases
job_desc:
The leading supplier of Industrial lubricants needs…

                                                          One (1) Sales Engineer - Metro Manila

                                                         ..to be part of our winning team.

Job Highlights

  •      Personal and professional growth

  •      Challenging but fun working environment 

  •      Comprehensive training program

 

Job Responsibilities

  • Generate sales for SPECIALTY LUBRICANTS & GREASES to general industry.

  • Grow the revenue of the group by introducing our products to new customers and industries.

  • Coordinate and monitor the orders of the customers with the logistics team and ensure that they are delivered on time.

  • Create accurate and timely reports thereof for the management.

  • Will be assigned to Metro Manila and North Luzon area.

 

Job Qualifications

  • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's/College Degree, Engineering (Chemical), Engineering (Mechanical), Engineering (Material Science), Engineering (Metal Fabrication / Tool & Die / Welding), Engineering (Mechatronic/Electromechanical), Engineering (Petroleum) or equivalent.

  • Analytical, aggressive, hard working and ambitious.

  • Must be willing to get his hands ‘dirty’. 

  • Experience as a plant maintenance engineering or lubricant salesman is an advantage.  

 

Compensation & Benefits

The successful candidate shall receive the following:

  • Working schedule (Monday to Friday)

  • Multiple opportunities for Growth and Development.

  • Basic salary up to Php 30,000 - Php 35,000

  • Use of company car. 

  • Annual salary increase

  • HMO upon 1 year of service

  • In house and external skills training (technical and sales)

  • Commission for generated sales

 

Apply now and get a chance to work in a dynamic and friendly working environment surrounded by great teams and peers, where there is work life balance.

title: Inventory Control Analyst
company: SAN MIGUEL INTEGRATED LOGISTICS SERVICES, INC.
job_desc:
Qualifications:

  • College graduate, Preferably IT graduate or any related course

  • Minimum of Two (2) years actual work experience in warehousing operations

  • Must be keen to details

  • With good communication and interpersonal skills

  • Must be proficient in SAP and Microsoft Excel

Duties & Responsibilities:

  • Receives (GR) in the system the actual goods in the regular SLOC and short landed terms in the short landed SLOC.

  • Transfer stocks for charging to the hauler/trucker to Claims to Trucker SLOC;

  • Prints the Receiving Reports (RR) and forwards the RR to the Storekeeper/Locator;

  • Creates claim issues Truckers with confirmation and signature of the Trucker/Service Provider;

  • Transmits copy of the miscellaneous Sales Invoice (MSI) with the claim memo to BU Finance for automatic deduction;

  • Checks inventory versus SOR and indicates the available physical quantity versus system quantity (TOF) during processing of orders for delivery;

  • Forwards TOF to the SAP Planner.

  • Reconciles details of the count with the physical/actual goods store per bin;

  • Reconciles system data after the conduct of the physical counts have been completed.

  • Reports the findings of the reconciled numbers with BU Finance.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
job_desc:
Job Summary

This role is responsible for conducting inspections and coating functional tests, addressing customer complaints, and monitoring product performance. You will also support QA activities, contribute to process improvements, and ensure accurate documentation to uphold product quality and enhance operational efficiency.

Key Responsibilities

  • Inspection & Testing: Conduct internal and outgoing coating functional tests to ensure compliance with quality standards.

  • Customer Complaint Handling: Investigate complaints, implement corrective actions, and monitor results for effectiveness.

  • Data Monitoring: Collect and analyze project lifespan data from customer operations to evaluate quality performance.

  • QA Support: Assist in dimensional checks, raw material verification, and final product inspections.

  • Process Improvement: Contribute to the development and enhancement of QA processes to boost efficiency and quality.

  • Documentation: Maintain thorough and organized documentation of inspections, tests, corrective actions, and QA procedures.

  • Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams to resolve quality issues and drive continuous improvement initiatives.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical, Electronics, Industrial, or Electrical Engineering, or a related field.

  • At least 6 months to 1 year of relevant experience as a Quality Assurance Engineer is an advantage.

  • Strong interpersonal and coordination skills to work effectively across departments.

  • Familiar with quality assurance practices and problem-solving methodologies (e.g., 5 Whys, Fishbone, 8D).

  • Proficient in documentation and reporting.

  • Willing to work in shifting schedules and render extended hours.

  • Willing to be assigned onsite at our Sta. Maria, Bulacan plant.

    "Motolite offers you not just a job, but a career with boundless opportunities"

title: Materials Engineer
job_desc:
Ascend Building Solutions Inc. is seeking a dedicated Materials Engineer to oversee and enhance our quality assurance processes while actively contributing to new product development and improvement.

1. Product Development & Innovation:

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams  to develop new materials and product enhancements based on market needs and industry trends.
  • Conduct research and testing on alternative materials, new formulations, and process improvements.
  • Work closely with suppliers to optimize material properties, performance, and cost-effectiveness.
  • Ensure products meet cost targets while maintaining high quality and functionality.
  • Assist in the development of prototypes and samples, ensuring they meet functional and quality requirements.
  • Support the implementation of sustainable and innovative material solutions to enhance product offerings.

2. In-House Testing:

  • Coordinate with relevant departments to systematically procure samples from incoming shipments.
  • Prepare and organize samples for quality assurance testing.
  • To ensure they meet established standards and specifications, assist in performing routine quality tests on materials.
  • Document and interpret test results, escalating any quality concerns promptly.

3. Database Upkeep & Analysis:

  • Maintain and update the product database with data from each shipment, ensuring accuracy and completeness.
  • Conduct regular data audits to identify trends, inconsistencies, and areas for improvement in product quality.
  • Provide data-driven insights to enhance decision-making processes related to material selection and procurement.

4. Report Generation:

  • Compile, format, and present quality assurance reports for management review.
  • Prepare summary reports highlighting key quality metrics, trends, and recommendations.
  • Develop and distribute periodic reports to stakeholders to ensure transparency in material quality performance.

5. Technical Training & Advisory:

  • Develop and deliver technical training programs to employees on material properties, quality standards, and best practices.
  • Act as a technical advisor, providing guidance on material selection, application, and troubleshooting.
  • Lead product application orientation sessions to ensure proper use and integration of materials in projects.

 

Job Qualifications:

  • Candidates must possess at least a Bachelor's/College Degree in Engineering or equivalent. PRC Civil Engineer license is an advantage.
  • Must possess strong analytical skills with a keen eye for detail
  • Proficiency in using laboratory testing equipment and data management systems.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills.
  • Willing to work in Las Piñas City

title: Materials Engineering Specialist
job_desc:
• Evaluates various types of materials used in electrical distribution applications (e.g. metals, polymers, ceramics for transformers).
  • Prepares engineering material specifications based on standards (IEEE/ANSI) and develops the list of critical quality criteria that supports incoming material quality inspection based on EMS.
  • Analyzes test reports and generates technical writeups and recommendations for materials.
  • Develops alternative materials for transformer components, particularly in the development of sustainable alternatives.
  • Conducts failure analysis of transformers.
  • Collaborates with multi-disciplinary teams and with external partners in ensuring the compliance of materials to standards

title: Management Trainee - Industrial Engineer
job_desc:
Job description

The Junior Management Training Program is designed to enrich the pool of graduates who have the potential to become future leaders of the company. It is an entry-level program that generally runs for 4 years.
 
Management Trainees must:

  • Actively seek out assignments and other learning opportunities consistent with their development plan.
  • Participate in the development of the four-year plan and annual assignment descriptions
  • Take full advantage of the training and assignment opportunities provided to further their career objectives.

 

QUALIFICATIONS:

  • Candidates must possess at least a Professional License in Electrical Engineering.
  • Must belong from reputable Universities/ Schools, with 0-2 years of experience.
  • Fresh graduates are highly encouraged to apply.
  • Must have strong analytical skills, with above average scholastic records.
  • Must have a history of leadership roles in the school or community.
  • Excellent in the English language both oral and written and possesses above average interpersonal skills.
  • Must be conscientious with high cognitive ability and possess initiative, responsibility, leadership potential and a solid work ethic.
  • Must be willing to accept assignments in Parañaque City, within Metro Manila, and provincial projects (Visayas and Mindanao Area).

    Interested in becoming a part of this great opportunity? Feel free to check our official website http://www.firstbalfour.com to learn more about our company and JMTP.

title: Production Officer 1 (Pasig City)
job_desc:
Be another key ingredient! Join the team that manufactures the most popular Filipino brand in mixes, sauces, condiments, and more, Mama Sita's!

MEADOW MANUFACTURING CORPORATION (an affiliate of Marigold Manufacturing Corporation) is currently in need of Production Officers.

The Production Officer 1 is mainly responsible for planning, leading, organizing, and controlling manpower, materials, machine/equipment, and processes at the production floor to execute and manage production operations.

Minimum Qualifications:

  • Must possess at least a bachelor's degree in Food Technology, Food Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Industrial Engineering and Chemistry
  • Must have at least 1-3 years of relevant experience in a manufacturing industry
  • Must have good people management skills
  • Must be proficient in MS Excel and other computer applications
  • Must have good people and shop floor management skills
  • Must be proficient in MS Excel and other computer applications
  • Knowledge of Supply Chain, Logistics, Warehousing is also preferred.

Your duties and responsibilities include:

  • Communicating Daily Schedule (DS), Weekly Production Schedule (WPS), and Material Requirements Planning (MRP) to Production staff
  • Preparing DS at least 12-24 hours ahead, in accordance with WPS, and coordinating preparation with all concerned areas
  • Ensuring that manpower, materials (RM, PM), and equipment required to run the production process are sufficient and prepared on time
  • Leading toolbox meetings of the team/team leader/members to discuss production objectives/targets for the period
  • Monitoring run of production processes, work flow, phases, and schedules, and achieving intended outputs to ensure on-time delivery
  • Conducting critical/essential/immediate responsibilities as contained in the attached QA/QC Task Checklist
  • Ensuring proper endorsement of production matters between shifts
  • Reporting any quality and food safety deviation, violations in company rules, and any untoward behavior of personnel
  • Preparing timely production reports, quality data, and FSSC-required data and information as required and directed
  • Performing other duties as may be required.

title: Industrial Engineer
job_desc:
About the Role

Paperlink, Inc. is seeking a responsible Industrial Engineer to join our dynamic team in Malabon City, Metro Manila. As an Industrial Engineer, you will play a crucial role in optimizing our manufacturing processes and driving operational efficiency across our production facilities. 

 Criteria for the Job Position:

  • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree in Industrial Engineering/Manufacturing Engineering or any equivalent courses.
  • Non-Smoker with good health
  • Preferably living near the CAMANAVA area, Quezon City or Manila.
  • Preferred skill(s): Motion & Time Study, Adobe Photoshop, AutoCAD, CorelDraw
  • Required language(s): English; Filipino
  • Applicants must be willing to work at 58 Governor W. Pascual Avenue Potrero, Malabon City
  • Applicants must be willing to work from MONDAY to SATURDAY with Night Shift (if applicable)
  • No work experience is required as FRESH GRADUATES ARE ENCOURAGED TO APPLY!
  • Self-disciplined with a good work attitude and leadership skills.
  • Results-oriented, dependable with a high degree of time management.
  • Must have good analytical, organizational, and interpersonal communication skills
  • Must be responsible and keen attention to details.


Job Responsibilities:

  • Analyze and design production systems and processes to improve productivity, quality, and safety
  • Develop and implement strategies to eliminate waste, streamline workflows, and enhance overall operational performance
  • Conduct time and motion studies, identify bottlenecks, and recommend process improvements
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement lean manufacturing principles and continuous improvement initiatives
  • Gather, analyze, and interpret data to support data-driven decision-making
  • Provide technical guidance and training to production staff to enhance their skills and efficiency

title: Industrial Engineer
job_desc:
• Bachelor's Degree in Industrial Engineer
  • At least 2 years of working experience handling business functions, workflows, and process analysis
  • Maintain a safe, efficient, and orderly workplace.
  • Prepare production and other reports.
  • Able to supervise staff, work with teams, communicate effectively, and maintain production schedules.
  • Problem-solving, technical writing, and computer skills are important.
  • Physical stamina may be necessary.

title: Associate Production Engineer
job_desc:
Job Title: Associate Production Engineer

Location: Misamis Oriental Plant (Villanueva, Mis. Or.)

Reporting to: Production Team Leader

 

At Coca- Cola Europacific Aboitiz Philippines, we are driven by our purpose to Refresh the Philippines and Make a Difference-- continuously leading the Beverage Industry with our Great People, Great Beverages, Great Execution and Great Partners. As we continue to Grow and shape the future, we are seeking passionate and innovative talents to join our team and make a difference with us.

 

Our commitment to excellence has been recognized through numerous industry awards such as Great Place to Work, Best Places to Work in Asia, Dream Employer of the Year, and Universum's Most Attractive employers- and we take pride in our achievements and the impact we have made in the beverage industry.

 

At Coca- Cola Europacific Aboitiz Philippines,  Inc, our people are our most important resource. We are looking for skilled Associate Production Engineers to be part of our Supply Chain Team.

 

Role Overview

The position exists to operate, monitor, and control production equipment and processes to ensure safe, and efficient operation and ensure quality of products.
Conducts immediate corrective maintenance activities to minimize equipment downtime and carries out routine preventive maintenance procedures to ensure safe, quality, and efficient performance of assigned equipment and processes.
Routinely analyzes equipment and process performance and implements corrective/preventive action methodologies to achieve continuous improvement in performance.

 

Qualifications

-Graduate of any Engineering / Industrial Technology courses

-Technical background in mechanical/electrical/pneumatics and automation
-Preferably at least 2 years training or experience in manufacturing operations in an automated production setting; preferably with hands on experience with maintaining equipment.
-Strong ability to quickly learn and adapt to new technologies
-Highly analytical with strong problem solving and decision-making skills; attention to detail and highly collaborative

 

Fresh Graduates are welcome to apply.

Company Socials

Reach us through our social media pages!

Linked In: https://www.linkedin.com/company/coca_cola_beverages_philippines/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/cocacolaphcareers

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cocacolaphcareers/

 

Thrive with us at Coca- Cola Europacific Aboitiz Philippines and be part of a Company that is shaping the future of the beverage industry. Together, we can create great moments and make a positive impact on the lives of millions. Apply today and let's refresh the world together!

title: JOB CONTROLLER (Industrial Engineer)
job_desc:
The Job Controller’s / Industrial Engineer's general responsibility is to assist the foreman in the job loading and monitoring of technicians.

Functional Description of Position Responsibility:

  • Assist the foreman in updating and monitoring of the job with the use of the Job Progress Control Board,
  • Under a computerized set-up, the Job Coordinator also functions as the data encoder on the computer,
  • Updates the Daily Work Control Sheet, where the units received are logged and,
  • Accomplishes reports related to workshop operations
  • Determine daily available manpower capacity based on the total hours of the available Technicians
  • Record all repair orders onto dispatch log and determine the repair time required.
  • Distribute repair orders to the most appropriately skilled technician based on priority and completion time
  • Distribute repair orders with expected job completion time
  • Monitor and follow-up on work progress for each technician to insure completion on time
  • Indicate and record the incidences and cause of job stoppages
  • Record number of and causes of repeat repairs
  • Record number of and causes of carry overs
  • Prioritize waiting customers, repeat repairs and carry over work
  • Keep Service Advisors inform when no more work can be taken base on available hours.
  • Maintain accurate time keeping records by ensuring all technicians clock on and off all repair orders and day cards
  • Keep Service Advisors informed of job delays and any additional work required
  • Control the distribution of all sublet repairs
  • Coordinate with the parts department in preparing parts for the next repair orders to be worked
  • Efficient distribution of all repair orders
  • Authorized to dispute and monitor all repair work to the Technicians
  • Works in cooperation with the Foreman and Service Advisors to ensure full utilization of department capacity

Minimum Qualifications

  • Candidate must be a graduate of Industrial Engineering
  • FRESH GRADUATES ARE WELCOME TO APPLY!
  • Strong analytical and planning skills
  • Excellent problem-solving skills
  • Possess good communication skills, good leadership skills, good time management skills
  • Must be familiar with MS Office
  • Well-organized, detail focused, initiative, resourceful, pro-active and self-motivated

title: Business Process Engineer
job_desc:
• Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's/College Degree, Certification or Professional License (Passed Board/Bar/Professional License Exam), Industrial Engineering or equivalent.
  • With at least four years’ work experience is required for this position; previous work in ISO-certified companies an advantage
  • Applicants must be willing to work in NCR

Criteria for the Job Position

​Required Knowledge:

  • Store Operations & Inventory, Brand Merchandising, Warehouse and Logistics Management
  • Just-in-Time Principles, Materials-Handling, Equipment Maintenance
  • Process-related Project Management
  • Occupational Safety & Health

Required Skills:

  • Conduct of Time & Motion Study
  • Process Documentation and Process Efficiency Strategies
  • Policy Implementation and Monitoring
  • Database Management, Reports Generation and Analysis
  • Planning, Organization & Control

Required Behavioral Competencies:

  • Collaboration, leadership, interpersonal and communication skills
  • Responsible, self-disciplined, results-oriented, with high quality of work output and keen attention to detail

Job Responsibilities:

  • Understand the work process, document the work flow and respective work processes of critical work units.
  • Recommend necessary process improvements or work flow changes.
  • Implement approved process improvements / changes to ensure efficiency and meet quality goals.
  • Identify opportunities to maximize the work spaces and company facilities and ensure health, safety, cleanliness, process efficiency and quality standards.
  • Help train existing and new employees on process, health, safety and quality standards.

title: Warehouse Supervisor
company: SAN MIGUEL INTEGRATED LOGISTICS SERVICES, INC.
job_desc:
Qualifications:

  • Preferably a college graduate, IE or any related discipline

  • At least 3 years' experience in logistics and warehousing operations, with basic knowledge of operations and food safety

  • Strong analytical skills, leadership skills, and excellent communication and interpersonal skills

  • Strong organizational and problem-solving abilities to address challenges efficiently

  • Proficient in Microsoft office applications (MS Word, MS Excel, and Powerpoint)

Duties & Responsibilities:

  • Supervises the day-to-day warehousing activities such as inbound and outbound operations of the Distribution Hub.

  • Schedule and assign tasks to warehouse staff, ensuring workloads are balanced.

  • Oversee inventory control processes, including receiving, storing, and shipping of products.

  • Conduct regular cycle counts and annual physical inventory audits.

  • Maintain accurate records of inventory levels and transactions.

  • Develop and implement efficient warehouse procedures and workflows to optimize productivity.

  • Monitor and enforce safety protocols and compliance with company policies.

  • Ensure equipment and machinery are properly maintained and in good working condition.

  • Implement quality control measures to ensure the accuracy and condition of incoming and outgoing shipments.

  • Address quality issues promptly and work on continuous improvement.

  • Coordinate the picking and dispatching of customer orders (SO/STO), meeting the required delivery dates.

  • Verify order accuracy and completeness.

  • Collaborate with other departments, such as procurement and finance, sales group, transport team, and shipping team customer service, etc. to meet operational goals.

  • Regularly assesses the team's performance to ensure adherence to established Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).

  • Identify and resolve operational issues and discrepancies in a timely manner and implement corrective actions to prevent recurrence.

  • Adheres to the established Good Warehousing Practices (GWP) implemented within the Distribution Hub.

  • Identify opportunities for cost savings and operational efficiencies.

  • Provides regular operational performance reports for evaluating team capabilities and identifying issues requiring management intervention.

  • Generate Monthly MOR (Monthly Operations Review) Reports to present the performance and challenges of Monthly KPIs to the Territory Head.

title: Industrial Engineer (FRESH GRADUATES) | Quezon City
job_desc:
Responsibilities:

  • Transfer of Work Requests (WR) to Work Orders (WO)
  • Responsible for monitoring all generated WOs
  • Coordinates with mall engrs / cluster engrs to validate specifications of request
  • Coordinates with the requestors to ensure that all requests are satisfied according to the required specifications
  • Ensures that requests are served at the least possible time
  • Coordinates with multiple internal departments with regards to billing and payments
  • Prepares purchase orders
  • Prepares bill rate

 

Qualifications:

  • Graduate of BS Industrial Engineer
  • At least 2 years work experience; Fresh graduates are welcome to apply
  • Willing to be assigned in Muñoz, Quezon City

title: Corporate Process Analyst
job_desc:
JOB SUMMARY

The Corporate Process Analyst provides support to the Company through implementing various process improvement initiatives and projects in order to ensure strategic alignment of the organization to its goals and objectives. He/she conducts studies and reviews processes of the whole organization to improve efficiency and optimize resources. 

KEY ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Conducts process mapping and documentation for assigned business process.
  • Analyzes processes using IE/OR methods and techniques. 
  • Develops solutions to improve the quality, quantity and efficiency of the throughput and output in coordination with process owners; utilizes process redesign, ergonomics, layout redesign, training and resource utilization.
  • Presents recommended solution, implementation plan and cost-benefit analysis to management.
  • Manages and monitors the implementation of the project in terms of output quality, cost and schedule.
  • Promote awareness on corporate policies and procedures.

JOB QUALIFICATIONS

  • Graduate of a Bachelor’s/College degree in Industrial Engineering.
  • With 2 years work experience in the same field.
  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills.
  • Knowledgeable in IE/OR methods and techniques and process improvement methodologies.
  • Good presentation skills.
  • Knowledgeable in cost-benefit analysis.
  • Knowledgeable in Process Documentation software and Industrial Engineering software. (Camunda, Minitab)
